Comment: That's no surprise Putin can no longer afford to end the Ukraine war!    Russia has thrown so many resources on this pointless war that even if Ukraine capitulated today and gave Russia everything they asked for (they won't), Russia would be looking at a decade depression to get back to what it was before the war!  Russia can tolerate how bad Russia is doing right now because of the excuse of the war, but as soon as it's over, a bunch of ogliarches are going to start asking why they lost so much wealth and prestige.  Putin might be strong enough to handle that unrest, but as soon as external unrest is taken care of Putin is staring down internal unrest.

Comment: The only problem with trying to win by overpowering Russia is that Russia has a near-endless supply of bodies that Putin is willing to throw into the meatgrinder. He doesn't care how many Russians he kills to get his way so he'll throw enough men that the Ukrainians literally run out of ammo, killing them all. So we have to address the simple matter of numbers at some point. Especially since the Russian people are totally willing to die to the last man for Putin.
